wikipedia_page.main: John Reid (born 20 August 1932) is a Scottish former professional footballer who played as an inside forward. Active in both Scotland and England, Reid made nearly 500 career league appearances between 1954 and 1968, scoring nearly 100 goals.

response: John Reid is the name of:
